description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class 'CreateScoreRequest' used for creating new score entries, including fields for player name and points with validation annotations.

classes.name: CreateScoreRequest
classes.description: A DTO representing a request to create a new score, containing player name and points with validation rules.

methods.name: CreateScoreRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the DTO with player name and points.

methods.name: getPlayerName
methods.description: Returns the name of the player.

methods.name: setPlayerName
methods.description: Sets the name of the player.
